Service Details: Delivers a voluntary, family-centered home visiting program to first-time parents, through family outreach workers who offer prenatal support, promote positive parent child interaction, support healthy infant/child growth and development and make referrals to community resources to meet the family's needs
Eligibility: Ages: 5 year(s) and under- Service can begin when families are either pregnant or parenting an infant less than 3 months of age at program entry- Service may continue for up to 5 years
How to Apply: Requests for referral are made directly to the Kids Count Program
Address & Map: 620 Leon AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 9T2View MapQuest Map
